description:
An efficient and professional remote desktop control solution


Fixed an issue where Screen Wall could remain stuck in a reconnecting state for an extended period.
Added Smart Network Acceleration for Screen Wall with automatic detection—no manual setup required.
Added memory for Screen Wall selections: single-control, group-control, and view.
Fixed all known issues that could cause a black screen after initiating remote control.
Added encode/decode latency detection and alerts.
Fixed connection crashes caused by insufficient user permissions.
Fixed an issue where incorrect local time could prevent connecting to the server.
source: 上海控控科技有限公司
